page.title: 16ST.MARY'S CHURCH WIX.FIONA M
page.content: THE FIRST CHURCH WAS BUILT IN 1050. LATER ON IT BECAME PART OF A NUNNERY. IN 1740 THE CHURCH WAS PARTLY REBUILT AND IT WAS RESTORED AGAIN IN 1880.NOW SOME OF THE BRICKWORK AGAIN NEEDS REPAIR BUT THIS IS VERY EXPENSIVE.THE VICAR OF WIX IS REV. DE GROOSE.HE ALSO LOOKS AFTER GT.OAKLEY CHURCH. HE HAS BEEN VICAR FOR NEARLY 2 YEARS.THE CHURCH IS USED EVERY SUNDAY FOR SERVICES.WEDDINGS ARE HELD ON SATURDAYS AND FUNERALS CAN BE HELD ON ANY WEEKDAY.REV.DE GROOSE HAS WEEKLY BIBLE CLASSES AND CHOIR PRACTICES. HE GOES TO THE SCHOOLS AT WIX AND GT. OAKLEY TO HOLD ASSEMBLIES.HE VISTS PEOPLE WHO ARE OLD AND ILL. HE WRITES ARTICLES FOR THE CHURCH MAGAZINE.REV. DE GROOSE SHOWED US THE DIFFERENT PARTS OF THE CHURCH.HE SHOWED US A BELL IN A CAGE IN THE CHURCHYARD THAT HAD ONCE BEEN ONE OF THREE BELLS.
